content: knitted bow/christmas decoration in drops cotton merino piece is worked from side to side in english rib with i-cord and double knit theme christmas pattern cm-156 yarn group b #dropshollyredbow **size** approx width = 11 cm height = 9 cm **yarn** drops cotton merino from garnstudio 50 g colour 06 cherry red 1 bow weighs approx 17 g **accessories** safety pin or tie to fasten the bow **needles** drops single pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 20 stitches in width and 44 row vertically in english rib on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm
